documents.document: http://t.co/UHS7PoiRJe
Live your present so lively and lovely so that in future you have only memorable past. –Donald Duck
If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you. –Pooh
You don’t really know someone unless you’ve cried with them. –Art in "Monsters University,"
All I need is a chance to do something great. –Chicken Little
This is my life. I’ll decide what to do with it. –Alice in "Alice in Wonderland"
Love will always find a way. –Sleeping Beauty
Don't let your heart be filled with sorrow for all you know tomorrow the dream that you wish will come true. –Cinderella
Thank you. You’re a real friend, not like some. –Eeyore
It is not about the people who act true to your face. It’s about the people who remain true behind your back. –Mickey Mouse
Whatever you do, do it well. Do it well that when people see you do it, they will want to come back and see you do it again. –Walt Disney
Don't lose hope, love. Once you've lost that, you've lost everything. –Mrs.Potts in "Belle's Magical World"
When the morning comes and the sun begins to rise, I will lose you because it's just a dream. –Pooh
We scare because we care. –Monsters University
If you are what you eat, then I only want to eat the good stuff. –Remy in "Ratatouille"
http://t.co/u6TGiw8vGu
I tell myself that I am not afraid. –Piglet
Don’t look backwards for very long. Keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things. –Walt Disney

http://t.co/MmvoiLnnb7
You just focused on the bad stuff when all you had to do was, let go of the past and keep moving forward. –Lewis in "Meet the Robinsons"
I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you. –John Smith in "Pocahontas"
The heart is not so easily changed, but the head can be persuaded. –Pabbie in "Frozen"
Take a chance ‘cause you can and you will see all the possibilities. If you try, you will find. –Disney Fairies
It won't change anything. You can't change the past. –Simba in "The Lion King"
You can't run from love. It has a way of tracking you down. –Tug in "Brother Bear 2"
http://t.co/sXWV0A7GGU
They say that home is where the heart is, so follow your heart and know that you can't go wrong. – Tigger

We might find something that we weren't looking for, which might be just what we were looking for, really. – Pooh

Piglet: “We'll be friends forever, won't we, Pooh?” | Pooh: “Even longer.”
Every beauty needs her #beast http://t.co/ZPnyqaqVk9
When you can dream, then you can’t stop. A dream is a wish that you make with your heart. – "Cinderella"
All my troubles and obstacles have strengthened me. – Walt Disney
I’m sorry I bit you. And pulled your hair. And punched you in the face. –Lilo in "Lilo and Stitch"
http://t.co/UdDla9J4iZ
You don't have to live in fear, ‘cause for the first time in forever, I will be right here. –Anna in "Frozen"
What makes you different makes you beautiful. – Princess Diaries
Don't be so hard on yourself. Everyone makes mistakes. –Belle in "Belle's Magical World"
Friends make every day an adventure. –Snow White "Disney Hallmark"
#Mulan http://t.co/Yv6mYQTjWE
Live can be playful. http://t.co/6qich7SygY
If I were truly to be myself, I would break my family's heart. – Mulan
http://t.co/OSQnbiIaGw
Miracles are real but they need someone to believe, so they can happen. – Disney Fairies
When life gets you down, you know what you gotta do? Just keep swimming, just keep swimming. –Dory "Finding Nemo"
Things have a way of coming together whenever friends are around. – Pooh
No matter what happens to me, I'll always be with you forever. –John Smith in "Pocahontas"
It’s the time of your life, so live it well. – A Bug’s Life
Once you love someone, they stay in your heart forever. –Nita in "Brother Bear 2"
I won't give in. I'm stronger than they ever knew. –Jasmine in "Aladdin Series"
This one is different. He’s honest and he’s sweet. He would never do anything to hurt me. –Megara in "Hercules"
No words describe a mother's tears. No words can heal a broken heart. – Tarzan
Love does things for reasons that reason cannot understand. –Joe in "The Princess Diaries 2"
A laugh can be a very powerful thing. Sometimes in life, it’s the only weapon we've got. – Roger "Who Framed Roger Rabbit"
As you go through life you'll see, there is so much that we don't understand. –Simba in "The Lion King II"
We don't like what we don't understand. In fact, it scares us. –Villagers in "Beauty and the Beast"
Mater: “I know I made a good choice.” Mcqueen: “In what?” Mater: “My best friend.” – Cars
Extraordinary things happen to extraordinary people. –Reepicheep in "The Chronicles of Narnia"
When other friendships have been forgot, ours will still be hot. – Mickey Mouse
Don't spend your time looking around for something you want that can't be found. –Baloo "The Jungle Book"
http://t.co/te06xrj6aP
Did you ever stop to think, and forget to start again? – Pooh
A friend in good and glad and sad times. The heart remembers them. – Christopher Robin
To the pain of the past, we don't have to feel it any more. Love is an open door. –Anna in "Frozen"
Once you’ve lived through the worst, you’re never quite as vulnerable afterward. – Walt Disney
If you are what you eat, then I only want to eat the good stuff. –Remy in "Ratatouille"
Buzz Lightyear: “Whatever happens, at least we’ll be together.” Woody: “For infinity and beyond.”
He takes me in his arms, and then I wake up. Yes, it’s only in my dreams. –Aurora in "Sleeping Beauty"

If there ever comes a day when we can't be together, keep me in your heart, I'll stay there forever. –Pooh
If you walk the footsteps of a stranger, you'll learn things you never knew. –Pocahontas
The past is behind us, right? Tomorrow’s gonna be a new day. –Buck in "Chicken Little"
Life flows along with a smile and a song. –Snow White
A mistake is part of life, and not doing the same mistake is a lesson learned from life. –Mickey Mouse
